segments.text: Steven , what's your idea of price ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The best we can do is $ 120 per case .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid that's impossible . You can't expect us to reduce it to that extent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you are well informed about the prevailing market.Some Spanish firms are offering the same at much lower prices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Price can't be separated from quality . A comparison of the quality of our products with that of rival goods will show you that ours is far superior .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's true yours are of better quality . But your price is still on the high side even if we take quality into consideration . How about meeting each other half way ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'll have to think about it and get back to you in about 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
